keyFacts: The document records routine Bureau of Prisons annual training for MCC New York staff in March and April 2019.
Training topics included whistleblower protections, PREA (Prison Rape Elimination Act), firearms qualification, and prisoner transportation.
Two staff members, Thomas Michael and Noel Tova, are repeatedly listed as attendees on these rosters.
The training location was consistently 26 Federal Plaza in New York City.
The documents are administrative records and do not contain direct references to Jeffrey Epstein or the specific allegations against him.
